metadata.title: Sambar- Lentil & Mixed Veggie Curry | Instant Pot Vegetarian Recipe | Kerala Onam Sadya | Recipe 1
metadata.description: Sambar is a popular South Indian vegetarian curry. In Kerala sadya, sambar is one of the main curries served along with rice. Sharing the recipe for making Sambar in the Instant Pot.

en: [00:00:00.000] sambar a south indian vegetarian delicacy
[00:00:02.000] made with lentils and mixed veggies this
[00:00:04.000] is one of the main curries in kerala sadya
[00:00:06.000] let's make it i'm taking three quarter cup toor dal rinse it in water
[00:00:10.000] let's pressure cook this add some water
[00:00:12.000] green chilies turmeric powder salt
[00:00:15.000] i'm going to pressure cook this in the instant pot for just ten minutes
[00:00:18.000] in the meantime let's soak some tamarind in warm water
[00:00:22.000] i'm gonna make homemade sambar masala coriander seeds cumin seeds
[00:00:24.000] fenugreek seeds roasted and ground to a fine powder keep it aside
[00:00:28.000] here's the perfectly pressure cooked toor dal i'll keep it aside
[00:00:32.000] next let's pressure cook all the veggies
[00:00:34.000] i'm taking drumsticks or moringa okra eggplant potatoes and carrots
[00:00:39.000] add some curry leaves water salt chili powder give it a good mix
[00:00:44.000] and let's pressure cook this for just three minutes in the instant pot
[00:00:48.000] after three minutes here are the perfectly cooked veggies not mushy
[00:00:51.000] add the toor dal give it a good mix
[00:00:53.000] and let's cook this in saute setting
[00:00:56.000] now it's time to add the homemade sambar masala so aromatic
[00:01:00.000] add a few pinches of asafoetida tomatoes and tamarind extract
[00:01:02.000] give it a good mix and cook it for a few minutes
[00:01:04.000] season with some salt and let the sambar come to a slight boil
[00:01:09.000] sambar is ready keep it covered
[00:01:11.000] next let's make the tempering coconut oil mustard seeds
[00:01:13.000] shallots fry it and let's add dried red chilies curry leaves
[00:01:18.000] finally add some kashmiri chili powder
[00:01:19.000] immediately pour it over the sambar keep it covered
[00:01:22.000] here is the best tasting aromatic homemade sambar
[00:01:24.000] give it a try and thanks for watching
